channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Audience Fell Asleep On Him During His Acceptance Speech
item.description: Donald Trump rambled and babbled for more than 90 minutes, and even his most adoring fans at the Republican convention got so bored that they fell asleep.

item.title: DHS Extends Temporary Protected Status to Haitians, Encouraging More Illegal Immigration
item.description: Extending and re-designating TPS to Haitian nationals, at a time of unprecedented illegal immigration to the United States, is yet another example of how the Biden administration’s open-border agenda prioritizes illegal aliens over American citizens. To read the rest of the article click here The post DHS Extends Temporary Protected Status to Haitians, Encouraging More Illegal Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Shows He’s Still Unfit For Office With Disastrous Acceptance Speech
item.description: Donald Trump showed that nothing has changed as he used the person who died at his rally as a prop in set piece, rambled and brought his old grievances during his nomination acceptance speech.

item.title: Voting Integrity Matters at the Federal AND Local Levels
item.description: University of Virginia political analyst Larry Sabato once said with intended obviousness, “every election is determined by the people who show up.” Yet now, in an era with endlessly increasing illegal immigration that risks undermining the electorate, the statement is woefully insufficient. What matters most to the integrity of America’s representative democracy is to ensure [...] The post Voting Integrity Matters at the Federal AND Local Levels appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: America Ignores J.D. Vance In Convention Speech Flop
item.description: J.D. Vance's vice presidential nominee acceptance speech drew 5 million fewer viewers than Mike Pence's speech in 2016.

item.title: Warning for New Yorkers: Moped-Riding Illegal Aliens Allegedly Robbing Outdoor Diners
item.description: Imagine this: you’re enjoying a warm summer evening in New York City, dining al fresco, proudly wearing the luxury watch you worked so hard to buy. Suddenly, a pair of armed, moped-riding bandits appear, robbing you of your prized possession. And it turns out these suspected criminals are reportedly newly-arrived illegal aliens. To read the [...] The post Warning for New Yorkers: Moped-Riding Illegal Aliens Allegedly Robbing Outdoor Diners appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Aileen Cannon Backfires As Hunter Biden Moves To Have Conviction Dismissed
item.description: Hunter Biden's lawyers are using Aileen Cannon's order dismissing the Trump classified documents case to request the dismissal of his own special counsel conviction.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Aren’t the Only Ones Migrating. Americans are Too
item.description: IRS data shows that American taxpayers are leaving sanctuary states for states that actually enforce the law. The negative impact of misguided sanctuary policies goes well beyond simply releasing dangerous criminals back onto the streets, it also impacts state economies and tax bases. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Aren’t the Only Ones Migrating. Americans are Too appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Biden Has Provided More Medical Updates About His COVID Than Trump Has About Assassination Attempt
item.description: President Biden released a letter from his doctor about his COVID treatment, which is one more official document than Donald Trump has released about the assassination attempt.

item.title: Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s Charade at the Southern Border
item.description: Things are pretty dire in the illegal alien sanctuary Bay State. As FAIR’s 2023 report showed, 393,000 illegal aliens and their U.S.-born children live in Massachusetts, costing taxpayers $2.9 billion annually for health care, education, criminal justice, and general welfare. To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s Charade at the Southern Border appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
